# docker_org_team (Resource)

Manages Docker Hub organization teams.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_name` (String) The Docker Hub organization name.
- `team_name` (String) The team name.

### Optional

- `team_description` (String) Description of the team.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource (org_name/team_name).
- `member_count` (Number) Number of members in the team.
